dspace-header.title: ETD - Interoperability Metadata Standard for Electronic Theses and Dissertations

dc-type.scope_note: Area of study of the intellectual content of the document. Usually, this will be the name of a program or department.

Institution granting the degree associated with the work. Like other names and institutions, this field should be entered in free text form as it appears on the title page or equivalent, with a link to to an authority record if available. See "Authority" section for more information.
Level of education associated with the document. Three levels are valid: 0 Undergraduate (pre-masters) 1 Masters (pre-doctoral) 2 Doctoral (includes post-doctoral)
Name of the degree associated with the work as it appears within the work. (example: Masters in Operations Research)
